text: Brian Lennard (1935–2019) founded Sacha Shoes – a chain of 200 shoe shops in the UK. He gambled away much of his fortune and was an early member of Gamblers Anonymous which he helped to establish in the UK. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:British businesspeople Category:Gamblers Category:People educated at Westminster School, London Category:People from Willesden
title: Brian Lennard
